publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2679 Iain Gray: The Draft Town and Country Planning (Fees for Applications and Deemed Applications) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2002-That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the draft Town and Country Planning (Fees for Applications and Deemed Applications) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2002 be approved. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran*

S1M-2679 Iain Gray: The Draft Town and Country Planning (Fees for Applications and Deemed Applications) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2002-That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the draft Town and Country Planning (Fees for Applications and Deemed Applications) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2002 be approved. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran
